name: Supakone Kongprapan
title: Software Engineer
description: Software Engineer | Tech Enthusiast | GF lover

bio.education: Studied Computer Engineering at Chulalongkorn University, graduating in 2025.

timeline.event: Worked part-time as a Software Developer at a Thai startup (Genomic Analysis Platform).
Participating in the Work and Travel Program in the USA.
Planning to join a new Thai Deep Tech startup.

missions.text: Become the great Person (Honest, Strong, Discipline, Wise, Dedicate, Speak Articulately).
Build/Create a (real) technology company for Thailand by founding it or joining one.
Help Phrae to be a better place to live and work by creating jobs and opportunities for young people.

narratives.text: I am in the process of becoming a great person. By practicing discipline, honesty, and dedication.
I am joining a small Deep Tech Startup in Thailand to learn how to build/manage companies and products, learn the good engineering mindset, improve my technical skills, and help the company grow.
I am Starting Youtube Channel Right now. Share my journey hoping to inspire other people.

bigGoals.text: Less than 85 Kg with 20% Body Fat by August 2026.
Keep doing Youtube Channel and reach 1,000 Subscribers by August 2026.
Become a Senior Software Engineer by August 2027.
Ready to have kids and family by August 2028 (Financially, Mentally).
Learn Some Martial Art (Boxing and some Grappling) by August 2029.
Having a flexible body by August 2031 (can do split).

challenges: I am not disciplined enough to stick to my goals and plans and need to improve my self-discipline and consistency.
I worry about the future and not being able to achieve my goals, and need to learn to trust the process and be patient.
I don't have enough money to invest in myself and my future, and need to find ways to increase my income and save more money.
wisdom: Being so good that they can't ignore you.
Relationship is the most important thing in life.
